info.title: OpenText™ eDOCS
info.description: OpenText™ eDOCS is a flexible, collaborative enterprise content management (ECM) system designed to support legal and other professional services organizations. Now you can bring content and processes more together by combining it in your low code solutions to ensure that critical business content is managed and secure throughout the content lifecycle, while remaining easily accessible for day-to-day operations.
